TopicTitle: MAJOR BUG: Rocket was mirrored while in flight (basically 2 in 1) after loading save

Articles.Content:
Hi all

I can't remember all the details of this one, but I believe I loaded a save and noticed my craft being uncontrollable while looking at map view. I was not able to fix it by loading an earlier save. The craft was basically mirrored and the nose part was glitched outwards, not attached to the craft.

Version: 1.0
Windows 10
Intel i5 8600K & RTX 3070 and 16GB RAM 
No mods were used at the time

Edited March 10, 2023 by techtox
